references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis.
references.reason: This work introduces a new framework for high-resolution image synthesis, which demonstrates the use of transformer architecture that is crucial for the character customization in the InstantCharacter.

references.paper_title: Personalize anything for free with diffusion transformer.
references.reason: This paper is important because it deals with personalized image generation using a diffusion transformer, which is the core technique used in InstantCharacter.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision.
references.reason: This paper is essential because it presents CLIP, a model which provides aligned visual and textual features, which provides crucial abstract semantic information, therefore enabling efficient personalization.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a method for high-resolution image synthesis that is foundational to many modern image generation techniques and relevant to InstantCharacter.

references.paper_title: Ip-adapter: Text compatible image prompt adapter for text-to-image diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper introduces IP-Adapter, which employs a clip image encoder to extract subject features and injects them into a frozen diffusion model via cross-attention, enabling efficient personalization, but it is built upon U-Net-based architectures.
